titleStmt.title: Anti-boreale an answer to that seditious and lewd piece of poetry upon Master Calamy's late confinement, supposed his who wrote Iter boreale.
titleStmt.author: Womock, Laurence, 1612-1685.

notesStmt.note: Contains also "A discourse occasioned by Mr. Calamies late sermn intituled Eli trembling in fear of the ark" p. 1-105, and "Mr. Crofton's position examined" p. 106-116.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
